```{r}
library(tidyverse)
source("../../global_in/general_scripts.R")
```

```{r}
tissues <- c("artery_coronary", "esophagus_muscularis")
profiles <- ZscoreProfilePuller(tissues, "../../MARCC output/variance_profiles_kendall/")
```


```{r}
ggplot(profiles$artery_coronary, aes(F)) +
     geom_histogram(fill = "white", color = "black",
                   bins = 30) +
    theme_bw() +
    labs(x = "ARTCRN Z-score (Heart Muscle)")
ggsave(filename = "figure_out/fig_3a.pdf", width = 5, height = 5)
```

```{r}
ggplot(profiles$esophagus_muscularis, aes(B)) +
    geom_histogram(fill = "white", color = "black",
                   bins = 30) +
    theme_bw() +
    labs(x = "ESPMSL.B Z-score (Epithelial Cells)")
ggsave(filename = "figure_out/fig_3b.pdf", width = 5, height = 5)
```
